result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jermaine T Wilson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jermaine T Wilson in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Jermaine T Wilson in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

AS TO COUNTS 1 & 2:

Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered COUNTS dismissed and read-in to case for the purposes of sentencing.

Attorney Vincent Paul Guimont in court, defendant Jermaine T Wilson not in court, in custody not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. aa  Status conference held off record.  Defendant seeking possible Drug treatment court.    Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.    Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with CVS at 9220 W. Greenfield Ave., West Allis

Defendant Jermaine T Wilson in court with attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  Defendant Jermaine T Wilson in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised due to lower pending case this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Status conference scheduled for January 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jermaine T Wilson
Current: 2115 N 21st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233   (Effective: 01-21-2015)
Prior: 1820 West Wells Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
